languages.text: "Простите, госпо{mf|дин|жа}, но я все же пожелаю увидеть свою Ракель еще разок живой. Она... Она — это все".
"Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady}, but my wish is to see my Raquel alive again. She's... She's everything to me."
languages.original_text: "Простите, госпо{mf|дин|жа}, но я все же пожелаю увидеть свою Ракель еще разок живой. Она... Она — это все".

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady}, but I'm going to wish that I see my Raquel alive again. She's... She's everything."
"Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady}, but I'm going to wish that I see my Raquel alive again. She's... She's everything."
"Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady}, but my wish is to see my Raquel alive again. She's... She's everything to me."
"Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady}, but my wish is to see my Raquel alive again. She's... She's everything to me."
"Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady}, but my wish is to see my Raquel alive again. She's... She's everything to me."
"Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady}, but my wish is to see my Raquel alive again. She's... She's everything to me."

languages.text: "Verzeiht, {mf|Lord|Lady}, doch mein Wunsch ist es, Raquel lebend wiederzusehen. Sie ist ... Sie ist mein ein und alles."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady}, but my wish is to see my Raquel alive again. She's... She's everything to me."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht, {mf|Lord|Lady}, doch mein Wunsch ist es, Raquel lebend wiederzusehen. Sie ist ... Sie ist mein ein und alles."

languages.text: « Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie, mais je souhaite simplement revoir ma Raquel en vie. Elle... elle est tout, pour moi. »
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady}, but my wish is to see my Raquel alive again. She's... She's everything to me."

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie, mais je souhaite simplement revoir ma Raquel en vie. Elle... elle est tout, pour moi. »

languages.text: “请原谅，大人，可我真的希望我的菈克尔还活着。她……她就是我的一切。”
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady}, but my wish is to see my Raquel alive again. She's... She's everything to me."

traits.locale_text: “请原谅，大人，可我真的希望我的菈克尔还活着。她……她就是我的一切。”

languages.text: 「恐れ入りますが…閣下、僕は生きたラケルにまた会いたいんです。彼女は…彼女は僕のすべてなんです」
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady}, but my wish is to see my Raquel alive again. She's... She's everything to me."

traits.locale_text: 「恐れ入りますが…閣下、僕は生きたラケルにまた会いたいんです。彼女は…彼女は僕のすべてなんです」

languages.text: «Perdóneme, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero mi deseo es volver a ver a mi Raquel con vida. Ella... Lo es todo para mí».
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady}, but my wish is to see my Raquel alive again. She's... She's everything to me."

traits.locale_text: «Perdóneme, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero mi deseo es volver a ver a mi Raquel con vida. Ella... Lo es todo para mí».

languages.text: "Bağışlayın {mf|lord|leydim} ama Raquel'imi tekrar canlı görmeyi yeğlerim. O... O benim her şeyim."
languages.original_text: "Forgive me, my {mf|lord|lady}, but my wish is to see my Raquel alive again. She's... She's everything to me."

traits.locale_text: "Bağışlayın {mf|lord|leydim} ama Raquel'imi tekrar canlı görmeyi yeğlerim. O... O benim her şeyim."
